caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities.
last_action: 03/19/2025 H Referred to Homeland Security, Public Safety & Veterans' Affairs: Mar 19 2025 12:35PM
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (including those identified as national security risks by US intelligence) from purchasing real property in Texas. While China is not explicitly named, Chinese citizens and entities would be impacted if China is designated as a security risk. The bill allows the attorney general to force divestiture of properties acquired in violation. US citizens and permanent residents are exempt.
translation: 该法案禁止来自特定国家（包括被美国情报机构认定为国家安全风险的国家）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买不动产。虽然没有明确提到中国，但如果中国被列为安全风险国家，中国公民和实体将受到影响。该法案授权司法部长强制出售违规购买的房产。美国公民和永久居民不受影响。
committees:
1. House Committee on State Affairs
2. House Committee on Business Industry
